title: Help with Bugsplat
body:
I don't play league for one day and my client broke. I run as admin and it still doesn't work. So I deleted RADS-projects-lol.patcher-0.0.0.69 and other files that the forums said to delete. Then I uninstalled League of Legends and all it's files. I then installed a newer version of the client making sure DirectX 9.35 and Adobe Air was installed. It seemed to work fined but right as it was opening the launcher it said "bugsplat.dll error" I then went to the forums and tried possibilities myself. I then deleted parts of RADS hoping it would patch up corrupt files. There was nothing on the forums [at least for windows] and I need help. This happened right when patch 6.20 came out.

              Specs: Windows 10 ,  8 GB RAM ,  1 TB Hard drive storage , Toshiba Sattelite

replies.body: You may have missing files or driver problems that's failing to render, and we'd like to help if the was unable to.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look.  Attach the logs provided by the hexteh repair tool for context, and we can take dig into this.  We'll reply to your ticket as soon as we can!

I wouldn't recommend outright deleting files as that could end up causing more issues.  Generally, bugsplat problems can be caused by driver and hardware problems.  The specific error you're receiving sounds like it could be a driver issue.  I know you've already done some troubleshooting and updating drivers, but I recommend additionally going through every step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out all possibilities.  I also suggest using our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to restore your files, and not deleting them until it's specifically instructed in the guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I'm now an alpha tester if that makes you more obliged to help. I have tried all the possibilities you mentioned. It still pops up with "BugSplatDLL resource not found" This has caused me tremendous trouble and I hope you know of a solution. As always thank you so much for helping
Yeah new client/patch busted my game all I get is bugsplat when trying to enter a game now.
seems common. me too and many other posts in the forums about it. Tried everything and no joy. I submitted a ticket with logs, we'll have to wait for that...however long it is.
Yes, that has happened to me before. But I am don't even get to the launcher part
